summary: The TextField component provides an editable text area within a UI, allowing users to type via hardware or on‑screen keyboards. It supports customization such as labels, icons, placeholder text, read‑only or disabled states, password masking, multiline input, and visual styling of cursor and selection.
business_intent: To capture free‑form textual information from users in applications, enabling form entry, search queries, messaging, and any scenario where user‑supplied text is needed, while offering hooks for validation and interaction handling.
